job_purpose: Provide Critical Technical Support to the Liebherr Onboard Autonomy Kit and Autonomous Haulage Solution.
job_duties_and_responsibilities: Provide real-time assistance and support for the Onboard Autonomy Kit
Investigate, analyze, and resolve Tier 4 escalations related to software performance
Prepare and submit test reports and performance analysis reports
Propose modifications to design for improved reliability and performance
Analyze data trends, system logs, and vehicle behaviors
required_qualifications: Bachelor’s degree in computer science, software engineering, or related field
3+ years of experience in software engineering with exposure to large-scale autonomous or industrial systems
preferred_qualifications: Specific development experience with heavy, off-road, or mining vehicles and/or autonomous haulage systems
Knowledge of autonomous haulage systems used in surface mining
Knowledge of technical fundamentals associated with robotics and autonomous ground vehicles
company_details: Liebherr-Australia is a respected leader in selling and servicing earthmoving machinery, mining equipment, cranes, and piling equipment throughout Australia and New Zealand. The company values collaboration, innovation, and employee growth.
